comments:

my classes. I'm using the debug mode quite a lot and I enfaced this NPE until
now only once. Unfortunately I cannot provide any further information.

Fixed in 3.1 and 3.0.1 streams. Changes in CommonSourceNotFoundEditor. Looks 
like the workbench was shutting down, so there was no active window or page 
(which we were not checking for).
